channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI brings a new web search tool to ChatGPT

item.title: Meta makes its MobileLLM open for researchers, posting full weights
item.description: Developers and researchers interested in testing MobileLLM can now access the models on Hugging Face, fully integrated with the Transformers library.

item.title: The Great British bond battering continues after budget speech

item.title: ‘I became very frugal’: My husband and I are 40. I have $200,000 in student debt, while he has $600,000 in retirement savings. Are we in trouble?
item.description: “Neither of us will have an inheritance and everything we have, we built together.”

item.title: Real-estate agents on how they handle haunted homes in an already-scary housing market
item.description: This Halloween, real-estate agents reflect on some of the creepiest, spookiest homes they’ve helped buy or sell — or lived in themselves.

item.title: The great AI masquerade: When automation wears an agent costume
item.description: Most of today's AI "agents" are really automation systems whose interfaces are “agentic." The trick is understanding what's behind the mask.
